By Deanna Young

Not too long ago, we were thinking about the 10 awesome apps that we wished existed, and hoping that some aspiring developers would get to work. Luckily, there are already lots of amazing music-related apps available, so, whether you want to snag last minute tickets to a sold out show or make music on your phone or tablet, here are 10 music-related apps that you should download right now.
